properties.headline: Shelter In Place Warning for Northern Cook County and Central Cook County.
properties.description: The following message is transmitted at the request of the Chicago Police. A dog named Odie has escaped from dog jail and is currently on the run. He is possibly armed and dangerous and should be avoided at all costs.
properties.instruction: This is an immediate shelter in place order for all of northern cook and central cook county. If you live in Southern Cook County, stay on high alert as well for possible other warnings, though none are expected at this time. If you see Odie, call 911 immediately and report your exact location.
properties.areaDesc: Northern Cook County, Central Cook County.
